name: THE CUBE (itch) (Alex028)
description:
Explore the adventures of a cube lost in time and space looking to find his home planet and recover its people.

STORY MODE-play through 11 challenging levels telling the cube's story along with a couple of hidden easter eggs, choose wisely between two different endings.

ARCADE MODE-collect coins, buy skins and hats, while getting as much score as you can (the shop is only available on the mobile version)

THANKS FOR PLAYING

I really appreciate that you took some of your time to check out my first project, you're a legend.

Bugs and Glitches

If you find any bugs or glitches contact me and let me know.
